channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 03:34 WARNING !!! DONE ALREADY OF USEED AVIRTED AVIRT Bombs (Kabiv).
item.description: 游릭 03:34 WARNING !!! DONE ALREADY OF USEED AVIRTED AVIRT Bombs (Kabiv).#Zaporizhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
